page.title: 13A Sunday In Kingswood.
page.content: Usually on{Sunday}some people in Kingswood go to{Church}or they{stay in {bed}longer for a rest. The wife gets up early to prepare the dinner which is usually potatoes, meat, peas, and gravy. The children might go out playing with their friends; some people might{visit their relatives}and come back late at night. People who work in the{emergency services}have to go to work and people who work in {shops}that open on Sundays will be working. Some people on Sunday morning get up early to go and have a game of {golf}or go{Swimming}at the Swimming Baths. On Sunday evening, children may get their equipment ready for school the next day. If they have nothing else to do they may watch television or play with their toys, and then they go to bed early because of school the following morning.
